alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Fergus County below 4500ft; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 22 at 6:45AM MDT until March 22 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...The Interstate 15 Corridor north of Power, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Hill County, Northern Blaine County, Western and Central Chouteau County, Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Cascade County below 5000ft, and Fergus County below 4500ft. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Reduced visibility for driving. Bridges and overpasses may become slippery and hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, be prepared for rapidly changing conditions over short distances. Slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
